Interface IDoctorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DoctorHandler
public interface IDoctorHandler
Interface for managing doctor-related operations

  • Method Details

    • findDoctorById

      Doctor findDoctorById(String doctorIdentifier)
      Finds a doctor by their unique Identifier
      Parameters:
      doctorIdentifier - the Identifier of the doctor to find
      Returns:
      the doctor with the specified Identifier

    • getAvailability

      List<TimeSlot> getAvailability(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of available time slots for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of available time slots for the doctor

    • isAvailable

      boolean isAvailable(Doctor doctor, TimeSlot timeSlot)
      Checks if a specified time slot is available for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being checked
      timeSlot - the time slot to check
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating if the timeslot is available

    • viewPatientRecord

      void viewPatientRecord(Doctor doctor, String patientIdentifier)
      Views a patient's medical record
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor requesting access to the patient's record
      patientIdentifier - the Identifier of the patient whose record is to be viewed

    • setStaffHandler

      void setStaffHandler(IStaffHandler staffHandler)
      Sets the manager responsible for managing staff-related operations.
      Parameters:
      staffHandler - the staff manager to set

    • setPrescriptionHandler

      void setPrescriptionHandler(IPrescriptionHandler prescriptionHandler)
      Sets the manager responsible for handling prescription-related operations.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionHandler - the prescription manager to set

    • addDiagnosis

      void addDiagnosis(String selectedPatientIdentifier, String diagnosisIdentifier, String details)
      Adds a diagnosis to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientIdentifier - the Identifier of the patient to add the diagnosis to
      diagnosisIdentifier - the Identifier of the diagnosis
      details - the details of the diagnosis

    • addTreatment

      void addTreatment(String selectedPatientIdentifier, String treatmentIdentifier, String details)
      Adds a treatment to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientIdentifier - the Identifier of the patient to add the treatment to
      treatmentIdentifier - the Identifier of the treatment
      details - the details of the treatment

    • addPrescription

      void addPrescription(String selectedPatientIdentifier, String prescriptionIdentifier, IMedicineHandler medicineHandler)
      Adds a prescription to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      selectedPatientIdentifier - the Identifier of the patient to add the prescription to
      prescriptionIdentifier - the Identifier of the prescription
      medicineHandler - the medicine manager responsible for handling medicine inventory

    • getAllDoctors

      List<Doctor> getAllDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all doctors
